attributes.action: Support the Palestinian People by delivering aid directly to Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Israeli government continues to close access to Gaza. This is illegal. The British Government should break this blockade and deliver direct humanitarian aid to the Palestinians in Gaza.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Support the Palestinian People by delivering aid directly to Gaza."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18456


Prime Minister's Office
